Interface PortletStateEncoder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EnhancedPortletStateEncoder, SimplePortletStateEncoder

    public interface PortletStateEncoder
    Encodes PortletState into a serialized form.

    Version:
    $Rev: 105079 $
